name: Veggie Go War!
description:
The witch's potion went wrong and you are now alive! You tried to escape from her, but it seem like that doesn't work! So now you have no choice but to fight back!

-Host lobby and let your friend join u on the quest to defeat the witch!

-2 character to choose.

-Attack - Attack Boss

-Shield - Protect from Boss's attack once

-Skill - Deal * 2 damage than normal attack to Boss *can be used 3 time per match*

-Item - Heal yourself *can be used 3 time per match*

This project is for the Bangkok University GI455 class.

Supervised by 

-Pongsathorn Kiatticharoenporn

Made by Biomon Team

-Chinakrit Aromsak-aree

-Sittharak Chiyarai

-Thannawat Wongvitootai

-Nithipat Siriwuttivate

-Phattharadech Nuchamorn
